sentence.text: Mutation in negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase I causes a wide spectrum of disease including skeletal dysplasia, neuronal migration abnormality, cardiovascular malformation, intellectual disability and intestinal obstruction.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase I

sentence.text: Reviewing the emerging dataset, we underline this unanticipated phenotypic consequence of pathogenic negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase I mutation-associated pulmonary disease.Conclusion: From the emerging data, we suggest that while reviewing complex cases with a sustained oxygen requirement against a clincial background of cardiac concerns or intestinal obstruction to have a high index of suspicion for FLNA related pathology and to instigate early MRI brain scan and FLNA mutation analysis.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase I
